character.statement: Locked.
Your mom must be very proud.
That seems kind of rotten for your players.
Hey, I'm confused. I met all those executives, but who actually makes the islands?
Can I go talk to them?
Why would I want those?
Good point. I want some achievements. I need them. Now. How do I get some?
No ads!
Won't that make the game run really slow?
PETS!
YAY!
PETS!
YAY!
PETS!
YAY!
PETS!
YAY!

exchange.question: Who are you?
exchange.answer: I'm the Focus Tester. It's my job to make sure players get exactly what they want and we all make as much money as possible. You know what the key is?

exchange.question: What's the key?
exchange.answer: Focus testing! Give the people what they want and they'll beg you to take their money!

exchange.question: That's crazy talk.
exchange.answer: No, my friend, that's business! I'll show you!

character.statement: Hi kids. If you could add ONE THING to Poptropica, what it would be? What would you like to see more than anything else?
Then it shall be done! You will all have pets!
As payment for your help, you all get cake!
And that's the way you do it.
You bet -- she made the cake! Help yourself to a piece.
I'm all about making games and making cash!
We've got something new and great happening. Achievements!
It's proof of what an awesome gamer you are! How would you know you had fun without achievements to prove it?
Surprise! You just earned one!
Achievements! I love it!

exchange.question: Who are you?
exchange.answer: I'm the Safety Inspector. I make sure kids stay safe in Poptropica. No more climbing, jumping, and exploring all willy-nilly.

exchange.question: You sound like a real drag.
exchange.answer: What if someone gets hurt? They'll sue our pants off! And we need our pants....

exchange.question: What are you working on now?

character.statement: What do you think about Velcro shoes? Y'know, for the players?

exchange.question: You look pretty slick.
exchange.answer: You bet! I'm the Ad Sales Manager! I'm tasked with increasing ad revenue.

exchange.question: You're responsible for those annoying ads?! I should kick you in the shin!
exchange.answer: Please don't. I get that a lot. My shins are very bruised.

exchange.question: What are you working on now?
exchange.answer: Check out our new ad unit. It's our most obnoxious one yet!

character.statement: That ad just made us eight cents! Totally worth it.
Forget the players -- it's all about the cash, baby!
Hey, if you ever have anything you want to advertise – come see me! Money talks!
Let me know when you want to advertise something. Just bring me the cash and the ad space is yours.
This is enough money to buy up all the ad inventory! What sort of ad would you like to run?
I don't understand. Why would anyone want to rob the players of wonderful ads? Well, it's your money. You can do what you want.
All this ad-space, sitting unused. It breaks my heart...

exchange.question: Who are you?
exchange.answer: I'm the Cost-cutter, but my friends call me Slash. Actually I don't have friends, but if I did, they'd call me Slash!

exchange.question: Why do they call you Slash? Do you play the guitar?
exchange.answer: No, I slash, slash, slash expenses! I just got rid of our entire writing staff! Ka-ching!

exchange.question: No writers? How will you keep the islands so fresh and original and brilliant?
exchange.answer: With the new Story Generator 2000, Poptropica islands will practically create themselves!

character.statement: My bank account is suh-weet.
This is my finest hour! I've eliminated almost all of Poptropica's servers.
Technically yes, but I dare you to notice the difference!
Ohh... You mean the development monkeys? They've been sent to the dungeon – I mean – basement.
Be my guest. I can't take another minute here. I'm gonna go work from home.
